name: Geek
body:
极客头条
========================

使用swift完成的抓取网页并进行解析展示的项目。

#效果图
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/miws/Geek/master/ScreenShot/1.png)
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/miws/Geek/master/ScreenShot/2.png)
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/miws/Geek/master/ScreenShot/3.png)
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/miws/Geek/master/ScreenShot/4.png)
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/miws/Geek/master/ScreenShot/5.png)
#使用框架
第三方框架|功能
---------|----
AFNetworking|网页抓取
Kanna|解析
DJRefresh|下拉刷新、上拉翻页
SDWebImage|图形展示

#使用技术
技术|功能
---|---
protocol|协议
block|回调
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
